scripts.fix-lint:default: (echo Attempting to fix lint... && markdownlint --rules sentences-per-line -c .markdownlint.json -p .markdownlintignore 'content/**/*.md' -f && echo Fixed successfully, please commit.) || (echo Fix failed! && exit 1)
scripts.fix-lint:win32: (echo Attempting to fix lint... && markdownlint --rules sentences-per-line -c .markdownlint.json -p .markdownlintignore content/**/*.md -f && echo Fixed successfully, please commit.) || (echo Fix failed! && exit 1)
scripts.lint:default: (echo Linting... && markdownlint --rules sentences-per-line -c .markdownlint.json -p .markdownlintignore 'content/**/*.md' && echo Lint passed.) || (echo Lint failed! Please review and fix errors. && exit 1)
scripts.lint:win32: (echo Linting... && markdownlint --rules sentences-per-line -c .markdownlint.json -p .markdownlintignore content/**/*.md && echo Lint passed.) || (echo Lint failed! Please review and fix errors. && exit 1)
scripts.lint-ci:default: (echo Linting... && markdownlint --rules sentences-per-line -c .markdownlint.json -p .markdownlintignore 'content/**/*.md' && echo Lint passed.) || ((echo Lint failed, attempting fix... && markdownlint -c .markdownlint.json -p .markdownlintignore 'content/**/*.md' -f && echo Fix generated successfully. Please apply the following diff using git apply && git diff) || echo Fix failed! && exit 1)
scripts.lint-ci:win32: (echo Linting... && markdownlint --rules sentences-per-line -c .markdownlint.json -p .markdownlintignore content/**/*.md && echo Lint passed.) || ((echo Lint failed, attempting fix... && markdownlint -c .markdownlint.json -p .markdownlintignore content/**/*.md -f && echo Fix generated successfully. Please apply the following diff using git apply && git diff) || echo Fix failed! && exit 1)
scripts.spellcheck:default: (spellchecker --plugins spell repeated-words syntax-urls --dictionaries dictionary/vi.txt dictionary/medical.txt -i =[a-z]=* ==* --files 'content/**/*.md'  && echo Spellcheck passed.) || (echo Spellcheck failed! Please review and fix errors/add words to dictionary as needed. && exit 1)
scripts.spellcheck:win32: (spellchecker --plugins spell repeated-words syntax-urls --dictionaries dictionary/vi.txt dictionary/medical.txt -i =[a-z]=* ==* --files content/**/*.md  && echo Spellcheck passed.) || (echo Spellcheck failed! Please review and fix errors/add words to dictionary as needed. && exit 1)
scripts.test:default: npm run lint --silent; npm run spellcheck --silent
scripts.test:win32: npm run lint --silent & npm run spellcheck --silent
